name: Conscientemente
description:
"Me encuentro en una habitación ajena, que todo el mundo parece insistir en que es mía."

 

This game is in Spanish, no text translation is available. We hope our illustrations are enough for you to understand our story ❤

Art:

Jimena Fernandez (Ookamijime)

Monik Sánchez

Karelia Guzmán (Yuiichi)

Music:

Josue Aguillon

Programming:

Jorge Cortez (The Code Raccoons)
